title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source LLMs locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat interface, model management, multi-user, dark mode, and plugins.

title: llama-cpp-python with Ollama example
summary: Drop-in C++ backend that can serve Ollama-compatible endpoints for faster CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Nifty interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama API with readline history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, voice chat, Discord bot, Next.js app, and fine-tuning workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Redis for a full local AI playground.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent builders, reactive streams, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: discord-ollama
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and context threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to answer questions with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows to query Ollama models for summarization, translation, etc.

title: ollama-gui (Flutter)
summary: Cross-platform desktop/mobile Flutter app that talks to Ollama for local chats and model pulls.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module exposing Ollama as a CI step to generate docs, summarize PRs, or test prompts in pipelines.
